item.title: Ubuntu Again
item.description: I’am taking much more time to focus on the technical work necessary for my job and I’ve moved completely on to Ubuntu on my home workstation. test tt

item.title: Attirubte Based Access Control
item.description: I recently attended an Uber tech-talk in Seattle

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I’ve started using Hugo and github as my static blog platform. I think I’ve worked most of the kinks out, and I’m able to publish from just about anywhere. I had been wanting to create and publish more content dealing with my work as a “big company” security professional, and keep a record of my thoughts.
